com.iciql

Interface SQLDialect

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SQLDialectDefault, SQLDialectDerby, SQLDialectH2, SQLDialectHSQL, SQLDialectMSSQL, SQLDialectMySQL, SQLDialectPostgreSQL, SQLDialectSQLite

    public interface SQLDialect
    This interface defines points where iciql can build different statements depending on the database used.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      Allows a dialect to substitute an SQL type.

      Deserialize the object received from the database into a Java type.

      Returns the registered instance of the type adapter for the specified object class.

      • getDateTimeClass

        java.lang.Class<? extends java.util.Date> getDateTimeClass()
        Returns the preferred DATETIME class for the database.

        Either java.util.Date or java.sql.Timestamp

        Returns:
        preferred DATETIME class

        Returns:
